New Records: Juan Soto now has 199 career HR, 8th-most before turning 26, behind only Jimmie Foxx, Eddie Mathews, Alex Rodriguez, Mel Ott, Mickey Mantle, Albert Pujols, and Frank Robinson.
Key Match Events: The New York Yankees used extra-innings to beat the Kansas City Royals 4-3 on Wednesday night at Yankee Stadium.
Juan Soto went 1-for-5 with a home run, two RBI and a run scored.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win moves the Yankees to 84-62 this season while the loss drops Kansas City to 80-67.
New York now leads the American League East by 1.5 games over the Baltimore Orioles.
The Royals are now 1.5 games up on the Minnesota Twins for the second wild card spot in the AL.
The Royals are seeking their first playoff berth since 2015.
